name: Stranded (itch) (maul1111)
description:
A scratch game I converted to HTML and is now playable in itch.io! (don't mind the broken title it converted a little funny)

Commands: (note that caps are not needed) 

BODY CHECK (or) BC (checks your hunger and thirst stats)

 INVENTORY (or) I (check inventory) 

HUNT (or) HT (gains food) 

GATHER (or) G (gains sticks, stones, and water) 

SLEEP (or) S (skips to the next day, costs a bit of food and water, can heal wounds for no cost) 

CRAFT TOOLS (or) CT (costs 5 sticks and 5 stones) (makes things give you more, required for raft) 

BUILD SHELTER (or) BS (costs 7 sticks and 7 stones) (reduces sleep stuff lost) 

BUILD RAFT (or) BR (costs 30 sticks, 30 stones, 10 hunger points and 10 thirst points and tools, must be new day) 

BUILD CAMPFIRE (or) BCF (costs 4 sticks) (reduces sleep stuff lost) (put together with shelter to reduce to nothing) 

ADD TO CAMPFIRE (or) ATC (costs 2 sticks)(makes the campfire last a day longer) HEAL (or) H (costs 2 thirst points) 

RUIN THE FUN (or) RTF (gives you everything) (recommended to be used if you are testing features)

original link: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/355507844/
